title: 19: Terrorism
itunes:author: Philosophy Talk Starters
itunes:summary:
More at http://philosophytalk.org/shows/terrorism.

We like to think that terrorism is always wrong. But what if the cause is just? Do the ends ever justify the means? And how do we define "terrorism" anyway?
itunes:subtitle: More at http://philosophytalk.org/shows/terrorismâ€¦

More at http://philosophytalk.org/shows/terrorism.

We like to think that terrorism is always wrong. But what if the cause is just? Do the ends ever justify the means? And how do we define "terrorism" anyway?
